-Sca# mE vyAqnaScaq mE &su#Sca mE ciqttaM ca# maq AdhI#taM ca mEq vAkca# mEq 
mana#Sca mEq cakShu#Sca mEq SrOtra#M ca mEq dakSha#Sca mEq bala#M ca maq 
Oja#Sca mEq saha#Sca maq Ayu#Sca mE jaqrA ca# ma AqtmA ca# mE 
taqnUSca# mEq ( ) Sarma# ca mEq varma# caq mE &~ggA#ni ca mEq &sthAni# ca 
mEq parU(gm)#Shi ca mEq SarI#rANi ca mE || 2
(aqpAqna - staqnUSca# mEq - &ShTAda#Sa ca) (A1)
